ygData.subject: Re: Skill Caps
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t mean to sound like I m disagreeing with you (I agree 100 pct) - but I don t really see the need for a petition.  As far as bards are concerned - who d
ygData.messageBody:
I don't mean to sound like I'm disagreeing with you (I agree 100 pct) - but
I don't really see the need for a petition. As far as bards are concerned -
who'd vote AGAINST it?

We definitely should start think about sending another GZ letter - and this
belongs on it...

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: jay schultze <sartori69@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, November 20, 1999 6:34 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Skill Caps


>
> WAKE UP VERANT!
> Where is the petition? I'd like to sign it...
>
> Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
> Bard of Kelethin of the 50th Chorus
> Veeshan
>
